results.title: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray 'Tongola'
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and George Nelson
results.brief_description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
results.title_for_label: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray ‘Tongola’
results.description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.

results.title: The Land is your mother
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Clive Atkinson
results.brief_description: Clive “Bidja” Atkinson reminisces about his childhood, firstly in the Goulburn River region and then later in Echuca. He speaks of his love for the land and the Murray River and of his respect for the Yorta Yorta culture that has been passed on to him by his family. Clive became the first Koorie in Victoria to obtain a qualification in graphic design but no matter where his travels will take him, Clive will always return to the land of his mother.
results.description: Clive “Bidja” Atkinson reminisces about his childhood, firstly in the Goulburn River region and then later in Echuca. He speaks of his love for the land and the Murray River and of his respect for the Yorta Yorta culture that has been passed on to him by his family. Clive became the first Koorie in Victoria to obtain a qualification in graphic design but no matter where his travels will take him, Clive will always return to the land of his mother.
description_for_label: Clive “Bidja” Atkinson reminisces about his childhood, firstly in the Goulburn River region and then later in Echuca. He speaks of his love for the land and the Murray River and of his respect for the Yorta Yorta culture that has been passed on to him by his family. Clive became the first Koorie in Victoria to obtain a qualification in graphic design but no matter where his travels will take him, Clive will always return to the land of his mother.
